action.action-desc: Mr. Crenshaw introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To prohibit the establishment of a Civilian Climate Corps, American Climate Corps, or any similar program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cancelling Climate Crusaders Act.

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law or any executive action, the Corporation for National and Community Service (in this Act referred to as the Corporation) shall not establish a Civilian Climate Corps, American Climate Corps, or any similar program as described in Executive Order 14008 (86 Fed. Reg. 7619, relating to tackling the climate crisis).
The Corporation shall not establish any program, direct any entity to create such a program, or provide guidance to any partnering entity to engage in any of the following activities:

paragraph.text: Remediating and reclaiming devastated lands left by extractive industries.
Organizing community-based resiliency coalitions and working groups.
Developing farm to institution distribution models.
Educating students through school and youth programs.
